46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Nafi that:a woman used to borrow jewelry during the time of the Messenger of Allah. She borrowed some jewelry, collected it and kept it. The Messenger of Allah said: "Let this woman repent and give back what she has," several times, but she did not do that, so he ordered that her hand be cut off

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَكُونُ حِرْزًا وَمَا لاَ يَكُونُ
chapter.eng-name: Stealing Something that Is Kept In A Protected Place
